title: Screen compatibility
message: Sony Vaio with N156BGE-L21. I tried 4m5 screens with same resolution and no one is working. Only original one is working. Could be just this Sony require only N156BGE-L21 ??

title: Screen compatibility
message: No idea, but if this is the older LVDS connector you can just flash the EEPROM with the data from the cracked screen. Sony is picky about the EDID EEPROM.
